( SELECT b.id AS bookmarkId, 'ooh' AS recordType, ooh.id AS recordId, ooh.title, LEFT(ooh.content, 100) AS contentSnippet, ooh.create_date AS createDate, m.name AS authorName FROM bookmark b JOIN ooh_record ooh ON b.ooh_id = ooh.id LEFT JOIN member m ON ooh.user_id = m.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.ooh_id IS NOT NULL )
UNION ALL
( SELECT b.id AS bookmarkId, 'oops' AS recordType, oops.id AS recordId, oops.title, LEFT(oops.content, 100) AS contentSnippet, oops.create_date AS createDate, m.name AS authorName FROM bookmark b JOIN oops_record oops ON b.oops_id = oops.id LEFT JOIN member m ON oops.user_id = m.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.oops_id IS NOT NULL )
ORDER BY bookmarkId DESC
